required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Omic Technologies to Track Resistance to Palbociclib in Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Omic Technologies to Track Resistance to Palbociclib in Metastatic Breast Cancer (OMERIC): A Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a monocentric cohort study, prospective and interventional with minimal risks and constraints for advanced breast cancer. The planned interventions are collection of biological samples at different times. The study will aim to do a descriptive analysis of omics profiles evolution (tumor, volatile organic components) over time, before and after disease progression under Palbociclib treatment with a clinical-biological database.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients enrolled in the study will receive the following interventions:
- Biospecimen sample collection: before and during treatment, and at progression
- Tumor biopsy before treatment and at progression
The aim of this study is to describe molecular changes associated with resistance to Palbociclib at the individual level and describe longitudinal changes in the profile of tumor, VOCs and exosomes according to treatment response.
Other objectives of the study include:
- Proportion of single or shared molecular alterations / signatures between patients at progression time
- Associations between tumor signatures, VOCs and exosomes
- Compare molecular changes identified by proteomics with those observed by genomics / transcriptomics
- Compare the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time with evolution of liquid biopsy markers.

primary_outcome.measure: Intrapatient variation in molecular profiles at progression compared to baseline
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of inclusion until the date of first documented progression (around 2 years)
primary_outcome.description: Variation over time in the rate of VOCs in response to treatment and in progression situations.

primary_outcome.measure: longitudinal changes in VOCs profile and exosomes according to response to treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of inclusion until the date of first documented progression, assessed up to 2 years
primary_outcome.description: variation over time in exosomes count in response to treatment and in progression situations

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of alterations / molecular signatures unique or shared between patients at progression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of molecular alterations in the population

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation between tumor signatures, VOCs and exosomes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Distribution of VOCs and exosome profiles according to the different molecular profiles of tumors that will be identified

other_outcome.measure: Concordance between molecular changes identified by proteomics and those observed by genomics/transcriptomics
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Concordance between identified proteins and expressed genes and/or detected mutations

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (CA15.3)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in VOC rate (rate of CA15.3)

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (CA15.3)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in exosomes count (rate of CA15.3)

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (CA15.3)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in liquid biopsy markers (rate of CA15.3)

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (LDH)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in VOC rate (rate of LDH)

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (LDH)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in exosomes count (rate of LDH)

other_outcome.measure: Describe the evolution of VOCs and exosomes over time in relation to the evolution of liquid biopsy markers (LDH)
other_outcome.time_frame: At progression time, up to 2 years
other_outcome.description: Intra-patient variation over time in liquid biopsy markers (rate of LDH)

intervention.description: Before and during treatment, and at progression, collection of : Blood Exhaled air Saliva Sweat Tears Urine

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women over 18 years old
- With histologically proven breast cancer, positives hormones receptors and negative HER2
- Advanced disease (metastases or non-resequable locoregional disease), from the 1st to the 4th line.
- With an indication for hormone therapy associated with the CDK4/6 inhibitor Palbociclib
- Agree to the sampling of the study
- Signed the informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Neoadjuvant or adjuvant treatment for localized breast cancer
- Metastatic breast cancer beyond the forth line
- Impossibility to give informed consent (person deprived of liberty or under guardianship)
